casebody.data:
Good Hope
v.
NCDHHS. No. 58A06 Supreme Court of North Carolina August 17, 2006

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of August 2006 by Petitioners and Petitioner Intervenors to Take Judicial Notice:

Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of August 2006.
